tool.name: job_environment_default_legacy
tool.command:
mktemp -d && echo \$(id -u) > '$user_id' && echo \$(id -g) > '$group_id' && echo \$(pwd) > '$pwd' && echo "\$HOME" > '$home' && echo "\$TMP" > '$tmp' && echo "\$SOME_ENV_VAR" > '$some_env_var' &&
touch "\${TMP:-/tmp}/job_tmp" && touch "\${TEMP:-/tmp}/job_temp" && touch "\${TMPDIR:-/tmp}/job_tmpdir"
